title: Why cant i open league at all?
body: I know there is an update but everytime i open league to check if the update can download the game tells me that the firewall is blocking access or there is no internet connection, it was fine before the update

replies.body: It sounds like your network is being blocked from establishing a connection to our servers, but don't worry we can help!  As a first step, I suggest using our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings to allow league access.  I also recommend using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is in tip-top shape to get you in-game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
